Name: SEI CERT Oracle Secure Coding Standard for Java - Guidelines 13. Input Output (FIO)
Summary: Weaknesses in this category are related to the rules and recommendations in the Input Output (FIO) section of the SEI CERT Oracle Secure Coding Standard for Java.

References.Title: SEI CERT Oracle Coding Standard for Java : Rule 13. Input Output (FIO)
SEI CERT Oracle Coding Standard for Java : Rec 13. Input Output (FIO)

MappingNotes.Rationale: This entry is a Category. Using categories for mapping has been discouraged since 2019. Categories are informal organizational groupings of weaknesses that can help CWE users with data aggregation, navigation, and browsing. However, they are not weaknesses in themselves.
MappingNotes.Comments: See member weaknesses of this category.
